category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEDelegatedOccurrenceProperties
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of internal BOM Line properties to be delegated for lines assigned from the Product structure to the Bill Of Process (BOP) structure. Only the following properties are supported: bl_occ_effectivity (Occurrence Effectivity), bl_formula (Variant Formula), bl_quantity (Quantity), bl_plmxml_abs_xform (Absolute Transformation Matrix), bl_occurrence_name (Occurrence Name), bl_abs_occ_all_ids (ID In Context All Levels), bl_variant_condition (Variant Conditions), bl_all_notes (All Notes).
